channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for SD
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for SD

item.title: Report I-2023060073
item.description:
Report I-2023060073

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-07T18:12:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-05-17
  • City: Sioux Falls
  • State: SD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: YRC GLOBAL
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: While unloading the trailer, three batteries were found damaged and leaking. The release was properly managed. The damaged batteries were placed into a salvage drum and held pending disposition from the shipper.

item.title: Report X-2023050772
item.description:
Report X-2023050772

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-07T18:12:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-05-12
  • City: RAPID CITY
  • State: SD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Box was pulled from trailer and was found to be wet. Was placed in a haz mat tote and upon inspection one of the lids was not on tight and liquid released. DescribePack: Lid was not tight on bottle. DurationRel: 6 and MitigateEffect: Box and contents were placed into a tote to contain and further release.
